title: Elizabeth Hurley, 54, channels Daisy Duke in racy red bikini top, denim cut-offs: 'More gorgeous than any 25-year-old'
text:
Elizabeth Hurley is back in a bikini. (Photo: Ian West/PA Images via Getty Images)

Summer may be on its way out, but not without one last bikini shot from Elizabeth Hurley.

The 54-year-old actress and swimsuit designer is marking the “last of the summer sun” with yet another steamy photo shoot for her fans. The Instagram shows Hurley channeling Daisy Duke in short denim cut-offs and a plunging red bikini top from her beachwear line.

Video: Elizabeth Hurley, 53, Wears String Bikini in Sexy New Video

Per usual, the Austin Powers: International Man of Mystery star was bombarded with compliments from awe-struck fans.

“Luv it,” an admirer wrote. “You're more gorgeous than any 25-year-old.”

“How do u not age? What a woman,” added another fan.

“God made you when he was thinking about bikini,” read another comment.

“You’re the reason the sun doesn’t want to leave,” one fan remarked, while another pronounced Hurley the “hottest woman on the planet.”

Given all this attention, will Hurley actually hang up her string bikinis for the off-season? And if she does, how will her fans ever cope?
